snippet: RUBINTON--Noel. The Board, staff and clients of JCCA mourn the death of Noel Rubinton who served JCCA with distinction for decades and as Board President and Chair. A gentleman of quiet dignity, he was devoted to JCCA's mission and the vulnerable children we serve. Barbara Salmanson, President, Board of Trustees 1/3
lead_paragraph: RUBINTON--Noel. The Board, staff and clients of JCCA mourn the death of Noel Rubinton who served JCCA with distinction for decades and as Board President and Chair. A gentleman of quiet dignity, he was devoted to JCCA's mission and the vulnerable children we serve. Barbara Salmanson, President, Board of Trustees 1/3
